bibl.title: Ray Raymond v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington, County of Spokane}ss

Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs. Ray Raymond Defendant} In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, in and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory.
TO THE SHERIFF OF Spokane COUNTY, GREETING:
IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon
Wm. Bigham B.F. Busch G.T. Bolden Andrew Eickmeyer Eli Wouch

to be and appear before the District Court, at the Court House, in Spokane Falls, in said County, on the 23d day of May A.D. 1887 at ten o'clock A.M. to here give evidence in the above entitled cause on part of said Defendant there to remain until discharged.
WITNESS the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of this 23d day of May A.D. 1887
D.A. Clement Clerk
By Deputy
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss
I hereby certify that I served the within subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to each of them in said County, on this 23d day of May A.D. 1887.
James Glipson Sheriff
By Deputy
Case No. 1980
SUBPOENA
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the Fourth Judicial District Thereof holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory.
Territory Plaintiff
Vs.
Ray Raymond Defendant
Returned and filed this 24 day of May A.D. 1887
D.A. Clement Clerk
By Deputy
SHERIFF'S FEES Serving 5 names at .40 2.00 Mileage 10 miles at .10 1.00 Total, - - - - - $ 3.00
